testsuite.name: Applications
testsuite.details: This Test Suite contains test cases related to the Advertiser App

testcase.name: Create a Windows Application
testcase.preconditions: User should have valid credentials to Login.

step.actions:
1.Login to Self Serve, https://grow-qa.vungle.com/

with valid user credentials
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be on the Self Serve page with the following tabs on th e left side menu

·       Applications

·       Campaigns

·       Creatives

·       And Add Application button

step.actions: 2. Click on "Add Application Button"
step.expectedresults:
User should be directed to the Add your Application page with the following platforms

  • Apple
  • Android
  • Windows
  • and Cancel button

step.actions: Select Windows appstore, by clicking on Windows icon and enter the store ID of the app you want to add and  click enter
step.expectedresults:
Search text box should open

App should be selected and "Save the application " button should be available

step.actions: Application should be saved with App store ID and Continue button should be enable.
step.expectedresults: This Android Application should be available in Dashboard too.

testcase.name: Create an Android Application
testcase.summary: Create an Android Advertiser Application in Self Serve
testcase.preconditions: User should have a valid credentials

step.actions:
Login to Self Serve, https://grow-qa.vungle.com/

with valid user credentials
step.expectedresults:
User should be on the Self Serve page with the following tabs on th e left side menu

  • Applications
  • Campaigns
  • Creatives
  • And Add Application button

step.actions: Click on "Add Application Button"
step.expectedresults:
User should be directed to the Add your Application page with the following platforms

  • Apple
  • Android
  • Windows
  • and Cancel button

step.actions: Select Android appstore, by clicking on Android icon
step.expectedresults: Search text box should open

step.actions: Enter the name of the app in the search area and click enter
step.expectedresults: All the available apps in the appstore with the entered search criteria should be displayed

step.actions: Navigate to the app you wish to add and click on Select button
step.expectedresults: App should be selected and "Save the application " button should be available

step.actions: Click on "Save application " button
step.expectedresults:
Application should be saved with App store ID and Continue button should be enable.

This Android Application should be available in Dashboard too.

testcase.name: Create an IOS Application
testcase.summary: Create an IOS Advertiser Application in Self Serve
testcase.preconditions: User should have a valid user credentials

step.actions:
Login to Self Serve, https://grow-qa.vungle.com/

with valid user credentials
step.expectedresults:
User should be on the Self Serve page with the following tabs on th e left side menu

  • Applications
  • Campaigns
  • Creatives
  • And Add Application button

step.actions: Click on Add Application Button
step.expectedresults:
User should land on Add your Applicatipn page with 

  • Apple
  • Android
  • Windows icon 
  • and Cancel button

step.actions: Select IOS appstore, by clicking on Apple Icon
step.expectedresults: Search text box should open

step.actions: Enter the name of the app in the search area and click enter
step.expectedresults: All the available apps in the app store with the entered search criteria should be displayed

step.actions: Navigate to the App, you wish to add and click Select button
step.expectedresults: App should be selected and "Save application " button should be available

step.actions: Click on "Save Application" Button
step.expectedresults:
Application should be saved and check mark and "continue"button should be enabled. 

Application should be available on the application with all the other available applications.

This IOS application should also be available in the Dashboard.

step.actions:
1.Login to Self Serve, https://grow-qa.vungle.com/

with valid user credentials
step.expectedresults: User should logged into Grow.

step.actions: Navigate to Impressions &Events section of Campaign and verify
step.expectedresults:
Following fields should be available

  • Select Event drop down with below events
  1. Creative Start(0%)
  2. 1st Quartile(25%)
  3. Midpoint(50%)
  4. Third Quartile(75%)
  5. Creative Complete(100%)
  6. Endcard View
  7. Mute
  8. Unmute
  9. Video Close
  10. Endcard Click
  • Text Box to enter Event Tracking URL
  • Add Event
  • Update Event
  • Added Events &Trackers Text Box

step.actions: Verify Creative Start
step.expectedresults: Creative start Event should be displayed in the select Event field

step.actions:
• Enter the URL,

https://view.adjust.com/impression/hrykb2n?campaign=121647&adgroup={{{creative}}}&creative={{{site_id}}}_{{{site_name}}}&idfa={{{ifa}}}&campaign={{{campaign_name}}}&s2s={{{adjust_s2s}}}&vungle_click_id={{{id}}}&tracker_limit=150000

  • Click Add Event
step.expectedresults:
• Entered URL should be displayed and "Add Event" button should be enable.
  • Event should be added

step.actions: Verify "Added Events &Trackers" field
step.expectedresults: Added Event, "Creative start" should be displayed in here.

testcase.name: Verify Geographic Location
testcase.preconditions: User should create an App and a provider

step.actions: Execute the Tracking page test cases
step.expectedresults: User must be on the Targeting page

step.actions: Verify the targeting page
step.expectedresults:
Targeting page must have 

  • Locations to select
  • Device
  • Connection
  • Operating System
  • Publisher and the Continue button

step.actions:
On the Targeting page, check the box next to the

search
step.expectedresults: All the locations must be selected and displayed on the right with "Countries selected" heading

step.actions: Select a specific location by checking the check box next  to a Continent
step.expectedresults: Countries under that continent should be selected and displayed

step.actions: Click on the check box next to the location, which is already check
step.expectedresults: Box should be unchecked and location should be removed from the list

step.expectedresults: User should land on Targeting page

step.actions: Click Continue

step.actions:
Create Creatives by following the

"Your Campaign was created" message should be displayed.

Admin Status : Pending

Status : Active

step.actions: Verify the content of the Email of the First Campaign Cretaed.
step.expectedresults:
You've created your first campaign! To view and manage your campaign settings head on over to your Vungle Advertiser Account. Keep in mind, before your campaign is set to Active we'll be reviewing your campaign details, your creative(s), and campaign funds. Questions? Contact our support team at tech-support@vungle.com
With ,
Team Vungle

The Subject of the email should be Your First Campaign

testcase.name: Reject a Campaign
testcase.preconditions: Campaign should be available in Mission ctrl and status should be Paused or Active.

step.actions: Login to ctrl env, https://ctrl-qa.vungle.com with vungle domain email
step.expectedresults: User should land on the Campaigns page

step.actions: Click on Pending search criteria
step.expectedresults: All the Campaigns that are in Pending status should be displayed

step.actions: Select a Campaign to reject and click on Reject icon located at the end of the Campaign row
step.expectedresults: Success message should show up and the Campaign status should change to Rejected, and should be available in the Rejected filter.

testcase.name: Approve a Campaign
testcase.preconditions:
• User should be Admin user
  • Pending Campaign should be available

step.expectedresults: Admin User should be on ctrl Env  on Campaigns Page

step.actions: Verify the Campaign Page
step.expectedresults:
All the Campaigns should be available with the following items

  • Filters for All/Approved/Pending/Rejected Campaigns
  • Approve/Reject/View  icons for each Campaign

step.actions: Select a Campaign which is in Pending status by clicking on Pending filter .
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be available

step.actions: Now click on Approve icon available at the end of the  Campaign row
step.expectedresults: Success message should be displayed

step.actions: Verify Campaign is Approved
step.expectedresults: Campaign status should change to Active and it should available in the search results of the Active Filter.
